name: Say No To Human
description:
Description

In this video game you will play as a zombie leader with a special power brought by him. You have a very unique power that you can free the zombies from hell and raise them from the dead. With these infinite powers you can build an army of gravewalkers and annihilate the entire human race.

How To Play

You'll play as a zombie leader who can resurrect other zombies. To resurrect a new zombie you have to approach a tomb and the power will awaken the zombies from the tomb. You can find the tomb at the beginning of the game or by killing humans. Your task is to kill all the human in the area.

Controls KeyDescriptionW / A  / S / D
Move The Character Credits

  • Soundtrack : https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle
